snippet.title: Operation Armstrong Trailer #1.2 (2020 Updates)
snippet.description:
We felt it was high time to update our first trailer to showcase the updates we've developed so far in 2020. Note the new, shiny VR graphics and Level Editor interface!

We're still aiming for a 2021 release with some sort of short BETA in the leadup. More info in these relevant places:

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1145490/Operation_Armstrong/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FullbeansStudio
Website: https://fullbeans.studio/
Email: admin@fullbeans.studio

#OperationArmstrong #AsymmetricVR
